body.message1: Do you want to delete the selected address book? If you delete it, the related content will be permanently removed and the address book will no longer be recoverable.
body.message2: Do you want to delete permanently the selected address book? If you delete it, the related content will be permanently removed and the address book will no longer be recoverable.

body.message1: Do you want to empty the selected address book?
body.message2: If you empty it, all the related content will be moved to trash.

empty.message1: Do you want to empty the selected address book?
empty.message2: All the related contacts will be permanently deleted and it won't be possible to recover them.
empty.message3: Do you want to empty the trash?
empty.message4: Its content will be permanently deleted and it won't be possible to recover it.
